tracks.text: A flaming phoenix logo and the word Kadokawa reflect in water.
The full moon shines over the capital. A cylinder of light shines over part of the city. Prince Zanac, in armor, sits on a horse.
A crowd cheers. Zanac smiles.
He turns to the light, one street over, and frowns.
Lakyus walks through the fire. A line of swords float behind her. Tina walks alongside.
Lakyus readies her large, black sword. A 3 story high frog covered in screaming faces shuffles through the street.
Muscular gargoyles and dogs with red eyes stand in formation. The hell hounds breathe fire.
A soldier runs away
The frog lands on the fleeing soldier. It lifts and eats the man with its long, thick tongue. It swallows, and a new, screaming face appears on its shoulder.
The soldiers sweat.
Something's in the air. Momon flies, carried by Evil Eye and Nabe.
The women let go and he soars to the ground.
He swings, leaving only ash. He swings again, killing gargoyles.
He throws a sword into the frog's face.
The frog falls back and dissipates.
The soldiers gape.
They turn back, and Momon stands in an empty clearing.
Nabe and Evil Eye land next to him. Nabe presents a sword.
Text, Overlord 2
Text, Chapter 13, The ultimate trump card
Lockmeier waves at Climb and Brain. Brain smiles.
Brain looks up, and sees a blond woman on a rooftop
Climb and Lockmeier stares. Brain puts a finger to his lips.
He parkours up the building to the rooftop.
The blond woman turns. She wears a white dress.
Brain pauses, and thinks
He takes a quick draw stance. A ring of light emerges around him.
Shalltear walks forward
She steps up to the ring
He thinks of Sebas, Climb, and Gazef
She steps over the edge of the ring. He draws his sword. She raises a pinky.
He sheaths his sword. Her hair blows from the force. Her nail chips.
Shalltear looks to the right. In the distance, a tower falls.
She turns back. Brain leaps off the roof.
Brain drops in slow motion. Shalltear leaps off the edge of the roof, and sees Climb and Lockmeier
Elsewhere, clouds of rubble waft along a street
Jaldabaoth emerges from the debris cloud. Momon stands, swords out, in front of Nabe and Evil Eye
Entoma and 4 maids in masks approach. Entoma waves her hands menacingly, and Yuri puts a hand on her arms. Entoma stops.
Momon swings at Jaldabaoth, and they fly into rubble.
Nabe glances
Nabe approaches the maids
Solution, Lupisregina, and Entoma follow Nabe
Brain, Climb, and Lockmeier pant in an alley
Brain giggles with wild eyes
Lakyus swings her black sword. A slash cuts through a row of dozens of gargoyles.
Her floating swords fly behind her and strike hellhounds.
Another frog shuffles behind them.
The enemies behind her vanish, revealing Gazef
The king rides up behind Gazef
Soldiers with spears race past Lakyus
She shakes her head
Bat wings flap. A furry tail swings. A skull with horns roars. A winged gorilla ox chimera wields a club.
Evil Eye floats in a transparent sphere
The shards break on contact with Alpha. She punches. Evil Eye leaps.
She dodges shots. Alpha punches.
She flies across the square. Shots fire at her sphere.
Delta looks through a scope and fires a gun.
Alpha punches the sphere and it shatters.
She waves her hand, and a sand storm flies in a circle around her.
Alpha breaks through the sand
She dashes forward and punches, breaking a chunk of Evil Eye's mask. Evil Eye flies back.
Alpha punches, leaving a dent. She takes a kung fu stance, holding her palm against the wall, and roots her foot. The wall shatters.
Delta fires
Smoke rises from buildings in the distance
In the square, Alpha takes a kung fu stance.
Evil Eye flies. In a dark building, rafters buckle. Momon opens a door.
Demiurge places his Jaldabaoth mask on the table. A grandfather clock shows 4:02. Momon sits opposite him, the twin swords propped against it. Mare stands behind Momon.
Figure with 6 arms
Figure with 3 arms
Demiurge bows, taking the figure.
Alpha punches. Evil Eye dodges and leaps. Delta fires. Evil Eye fires shards, missing Alpha. Across the square, Lupisregina watches.
Nabe gasps
Her sisters stare as they loiter behind a wall.
Dust falls from a ceiling. A crowd of people stand.
Climb grits his teeth. Alpha punches Evil Eye in the stomach. She coughs. Alpha punches her face and she goes flying.
She rolls across the square then hovers
Nearby, Nabe flies out from a debris cloud. She holds a sword. Evil Eye lands next to her.
The pair stare at the 5 maids
Jaldabaoth flies back from an explosion of smoke, fire, and rubble. He falls to the ground and rolls. He lies limp for a moment
A shadow emerges from the smoke.
Jaldabaoth stands and bows.
Momon brandishes a sword. Jaldabaoth walks forward, then charges.
Momon swings. Jaldabaoth deflects with claws. Swing. Parry. Claws. Block. Swing. Parry.
Jaldabaoth reaches. Momon leaps back and tosses his sword in the air. Evil Eye gasps. Momon wields a spear of fire and shoots.
Jaldabaoth cocoons himself in fire and takes the fire spear.
A pillar of fire ripples and explodes. Momon parkours off a building, catches his sword, flips, and swings.
Jaldaboath catches the sword, his body rippling with fire. The blade melts under his fingers.
Black flames crawl up his arm.
Momon drops his sword
A cloud of snow and icicles races to Jaldabaoth
The mist clears.
5 maids gather
The 6 teleport away
The fires vanish. The sun rises over the building. Evil Eye runs and leaps, wrapping her arms around Momon's neck.
He raises his sword in the air
Blue Rose and Marquis Raeven address Momon and Nabe outside of the capital.
Momon and Nabe approach sorcerors, who conjure a floating board.
They fly off. In the Eight Fingers board room, Aura addresses a table.
Climb addresses Renner in the castle.
She smiles wide. Climb looks up. She smiles sweetly.
In a bar, Brain sits with Blue Rose
Pestonya addresses maids in Nazarick
Albedo stands next to the throne under the flag of Ains Ooal Gown
Ains approaches.
He turns and sits on the throne.
Albedo turns to him and kneels.
His eyes shimmer red.
A lamp glitters
The oracle bows. He has a long, white beard. The emperor has short blond hair and wears a golden circlet.
